  • Properties
checks

checks de.unkrig: Wrap annotation

Verifies that annotations and annotation type declarations are uniformly wrapped and indented.

    • Property Summary

      Properties 
      Property Name and Description
      allowOneLineDecl
      Whether to allow a complete annotation declaration in one single line.
      wrapDeclBeforeAt
      Whether to wrap annotation declarations before "@".
      wrapDeclBeforeLCurly
      Whether to wrap annotation type declarations before the opening curly brace.
      allowMultiplePerLine
      Whether multiple annotations in one line are allowed.
      wrapElementValueArrayInitializerBeforeLCurly
      Whether to wrap element value array initializers before the opening curly brace.
      allowMultipleElementValueArrayInitializersPerLine
      Whether multiple element value array initializers in one line are allowed.

    • Property Detail

      • allowOneLineDecl

        Whether to allow a complete annotation declaration in one single line. Example: 
        public @interface MyAnno {}

      • wrapDeclBeforeAt

        Whether to wrap annotation declarations before "@". Example: 
        private
@interface MyAnno {

      • wrapDeclBeforeLCurly

        Whether to wrap annotation type declarations before the opening curly brace. Example: 
        public interface @MyAnnotationType
{

      • allowMultiplePerLine

        Whether multiple annotations in one line are allowed. Example: 
        @Column @NotNull

      • wrapElementValueArrayInitializerBeforeLCurly

        Whether to wrap element value array initializers before the opening curly brace. Example: 
        @SuppressWarnings(
{ ...

      • allowMultipleElementValueArrayInitializersPerLine

        Whether multiple element value array initializers in one line are allowed. Example: 
        @SuppressWarnings {
    "unchecked", "rawtypes"
}
